summary: Expands Crossbows by adding more variations of the original crossbows and adds more bolt types. Also added to common loot.
descriptionHtml:
==================================================================
= DFB - Dawnguard - Crossbow Expansion
==================================================================

Author: Darkfirebird

==========
=Overview=
==========
Expands Crossbows by adding more variations of the original crossbows and adds more bolt types. Also added to common loot.

===============
= Description =
===============
-Was disappointed to not really see crossbows outside the expansion NPCs. So added it to some generic loot for bows across all levels.
-Adds Crossbows and Dwarven ( Including Enchanted ) variants to most common loots for Bows and more types of bolts.
+There are 2 additional variations to each crossbow.
++Rusted Steel Crossbow - Slightly slower and less damage then normal.
++Tuned Steel Crossbow - Shoots 10% quicker then normal and has about the same damage as normal.
++Ancient Dwarven Crossbow - Slightly slower and less damage then normal.
++Tuned Dwarven Crossbow - Shoots 10% quicker then normal and has about the same damage as normal.

+Also adds some variations of the bolts
++Dragonbone Bolt: Strongest bolt, requires a Dragonbone and Firewood per 12.
++Ebony Bolt: Strong bolt, requires a Ebony Ingot and Firewood per 12.
++Elven Bolt: Decent bolt, requires a Refined Moonstone Ingot, Quicksilver Ingot and 2 Firewood per 24.
++Glass Bolt: Decent bolt, requires a Malachite Ingot and Firewood per 12.
++Orcish Bolt: Decent bolt, requires a Orichalum Ingot and Firewood per 12.
++Rusted Steel Bolt: Deals slightly less damage then normal.
++Ancient Dwarven Bolt: Same as Rusted Steel Bolt ( On par with normal Steel Bolt. )

There is also Exploding <Type> of <Element> of the following:
Dragonbone, Ebony, Glass, Elven, and Orcish. They are crafted only. ( Also requires Arcane Blacksmith + Smithing perk for correct type. )
++Requires 1 Fire, Frost or Void Salt and 10 Bolts.

+Renamed normal variation of Crossbow to Steel Crossbow ( and all Enchanted crossbows to Steel Crossbow of <Enchant> )

NPCs that may have it for sale or Containers:
-Any that rely on LItemWeaponBow and LItemWeaponBowFine.

NPCs that can have it:
-Imperial and Stormcloak soldiers.
-Bandits and any that use LItemBanditWeaponBow.

=========
= Notes =
=========
May require a full wait period of 3~7 days for loot to 'reset' to take effect.
May conflict with other mods that edit LItemBanditWeaponBow, LItemWeaponBow, LItemWeaponBowFine, CWSoldierImperialGear, CWSoldierImperialGearNoTorch, CWSoldierSonsGear, CWSoldierSonsGearNoTorch.

============
= Updating =
============
Due to change of name, you have to uninstall the previous version before enabling this one. Wait 3~7 days ( Again! ) to make sure all NPCs and loot have the new setup.

=================
=Version History=
=================
== Version 1.3 ==
-Added 5 new bolts. All can be crafted with appropriate perks. They also can be found as loot or from vendors. They do about same damage as arrow versions.
-Added 15 enchanted bolts. 3 for each new bolt ( Craftable ).
-Renamed to Crossbow Expansion as it does more then add more crossbow locations. ( You may lose any custom crossbow / bolts added by the older version to this version. )

== Version 1.2 ==
-Added new textures and models for Rusted Steel Crossbow + Bolts and Ancient Dwarven Crossbow + Bolt.
-Lowered damage of Rusted Steel Crossbow by about 2 damage. ( Before perks and skill levels. )

== Version 1.1 ==
-Added Crossbows to Imperial and Stormcloaks. ( They will randomize between either their normal bow or a Steel Crossbow + Random Bolts. )

== Version 1.0 ==
Initial Release
